example.parse: (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يمكن) (S-NOM-SBJ (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM القول) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (SBAR-NOM-TPC-3 (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قبل) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحوادث)))))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينطبق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-4 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (PRON_3FS ها)))))) (NAC (CONJ و) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لم)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J يشأ) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المعنيون)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاقرار)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المتغيرات)))) (CONJ او) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعلان) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))))))))))

arg.g: to confirm or declare the variables

example.parse: (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تشاء) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الصدفة)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (VP (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تكون) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN_QUANT+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM غالبية) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوكلاء) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACCGEN الحصريين))) (ADJP-PRD-2 (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مسيحية))) (CONJ و) (VP (NP-SBJ=1 (NOUN_QUANT+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM غالبية) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوكلاء) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN النفطيين))) (ADJP-PRD=2 (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مسلمة)))))

arg.g: that the majority of the representatives are Christian while the majority of the oil representatives are Muslims

example.arg: ان تكون غالبية الوكلاء الحصريين مسيحية و غالبية الوكلاء النفطيين مسلمة
